怲字的基本解释

怲
bǐng
〔怲怲〕忧愁的样子，如“未见君子，忧心怲怲。”

怲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǐng］
［《廣韻》兵永切，上梗，幫。］
［《廣韻》陂病切，去映，幫。］
忧愁。

怲字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　怲； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页382第22
【唐韻】兵永切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】補永切，?音丙。【說文】憂也。从心丙聲。　又【廣韻】陂病切【集韻】【類篇】彼病切，?音柄。義同。　又叶兵旺切，音謗。【詩·小雅】蔦與女蘿，施于松上。未見君子，憂心怲怲。

怲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
怲字的起名意思

暂无。

mournful
Basic explanation of words
mournful
bǐng
〔怲怲〕Sorrowful look, such as "I have not seen a gentleman, I am worried."
mournful
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǐng］
["Guang Yun" Bing Yong cuts, on the stem, help. ]
["Guang Yun" Pi is cut off, go to film, help. ]
sad.
mournful
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　怲; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 382 22
[Tang Yun] Bing Yongqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Make up Yongqie,? Sound C. [Said Wen] Worry too. Bing sound from the heart.　[Guang Yun] Pei's disease is cut off [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] That disease is cut off,? Sound handle. The same meaning.　 Ye Bing Wangqi again, the sound is slanderous. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Tiao and Nuluo, applied to the pine. No gentleman, worried.
